type: Tutorial Step - Add a Time Machine

definition.text: Look at you! You are making great progress. Now lets get that Time Machine added!

paragraphs.text: Hover over your Dashboard and click Add Time Machine.
When naming a Time Machine it is helpful to reference the Trading System and type of Trading Session that will be connected to the chart. For us that would be:
Other helpful information you can use to label your charts can include the exchange, market pair, and network node associated with the information featured.
